aws-marketplace:Intent.description: Filters access by the Intent parameter in the StartChangeSet request

aws:RequestTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by tags that are passed in the request

aws:ResourceTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by tags associated with the resource

aws:TagKeys.description: Filters access by tag keys that are passed in the request

catalog:ChangeType.description: Filters access by the change type in the StartChangeSet request

aws-marketplace:AgreementType.description: Filters access by the type of the agreement

aws-marketplace:PartyType.description: Filters access by the party type of the agreement

aws-marketplace:ProductId.description: Filters access by product id for AWS Marketplace RedHat OpenShift and Bedrock Products. Note: Using this condition key will not restrict access to products in AWS Marketplace
